{{disambig-more: '''''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - The Complete Recordings''''' is an album, by [[Howard Shore]], comprising the soundtrack from the [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)
The Return of the King: extended edition]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''.
